name: filesystem-mcp
description: Comprehensive MCP server for file system, Git repository, and Docker container operations
long_description: A professional MCP server built with FastMCP 2.12 that provides comprehensive file system operations, Git repository management, and Docker container tools. Features include secure path handling, structured logging, and modern Python patterns.
